card.name: Archon of Justice
card.property: Flying When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.

card.name: Ballynock Trapper
card.property: {T}: Tap target creature. Whenever you cast a white spell, you may untap Ballynock Trapper.

card.name: Cenn's Enlistment
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Endless Horizons
card.property: When Endless Horizons enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Plains cards, exile them, then shuffle. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card you own exiled with Endless Horizons into your hand.

card.name: Endure
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn.

card.name: Flickerwisp
card.property: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Hallowed Burial
card.property: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.

card.name: Kithkin Spellduster
card.property: Flying {1}{W}, Sacrifice Kithkin Spellduster: Destroy target enchantment. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Kithkin Zealot
card.property: When Kithkin Zealot enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each black and/or red permanent target opponent controls.

card.name: Light from Within
card.property: Chroma — Each creature you control gets +1/+1 for each white mana symbol in its mana cost.

card.name: Loyal Gyrfalcon
card.property: Defender, flying Whenever you cast a white spell, Loyal Gyrfalcon loses defender until end of turn.

card.name: Patrol Signaler
card.property: {1} {W}, {Q}: Create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

card.name: Recumbent Bliss
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Spirit of the Hearth
card.property: Flying You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Springjack Shepherd
card.property: Chroma — When Springjack Shepherd enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token for each white mana symbol in the mana costs of permanents you control.

card.name: Suture Spirit
card.property: Flying {W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Banishing Knack
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

card.name: Cache Raiders
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dream Fracture
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card. Draw a card.

card.name: Dream Thief
card.property: Flying When Dream Thief enters the battlefield, draw a card if you've cast another blue spell this turn.

card.name: Glamerdye
card.property: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Idle Thoughts
card.property: {2}: Draw a card if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Indigo Faerie

card.name: Inundate
card.property: Return all nonblue creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Merrow Levitator
card.property: {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, you may untap Merrow Levitator.

card.name: Oona's Grace
card.property: Target player draws a card. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Razorfin Abolisher
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Return target creature with a counter on it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sanity Grinding
card.property: Chroma — Reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each blue mana symbol in the mana costs of the revealed cards, target opponent mills a card. Then put the cards you revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Talonrend
card.property: Flying {U/R}: Talonrend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Wake Thrasher

card.name: Wilderness Hypnotist

card.name: Ashling, the Extinguisher

card.name: Lingering Tormentor

card.name: Necroskitter

card.name: Soot Imp

card.name: Soul Snuffers

card.name: Umbra Stalker

card.name: Impelled Giant

card.name: Rekindled Flame

card.name: Stigma Lasher

card.name: Thunderblust

card.name: Unnerving Assault

card.name: Canker Abomination

card.property: Creatures your opponents control lose flying until end of turn if {G} was spent to cast this spell, and creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if {U} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {G}{U} was spent.)

card.name: Murkfiend Liege
card.property: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. Untap all green and/or blue creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Overbeing of Myth
card.property: Overbeing of Myth's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

card.name: Selkie Hedge-Mage
card.property: When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Forests, you may gain 3 life. When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Islands, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shorecrasher Mimic
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell that's both green and blue, Shorecrasher Mimic has base power and toughness 5/3 until end of turn and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Slippery Bogle
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Snakeform
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Snake with base power and toughness 1/1. Draw a card.

card.name: Spitting Image
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target creature. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

card.name: Sturdy Hatchling
card.property: Sturdy Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. {G/U}: Sturdy Hatchling gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever you cast a green spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Sturdy Hatchling. Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Sturdy Hatchling.

card.name: Trapjaw Kelpie
card.property: Flash Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Wistful Selkie
card.property: When Wistful Selkie enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Altar Golem
card.property: Trample Altar Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield. Altar Golem doesn't untap during your untap step. Tap five untapped creatures you control: Untap Altar Golem.

card.name: Antler Skulkin
card.property: {2}: Target white creature gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Fang Skulkin
card.property: {2}: Target black creature gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

card.name: Hoof Skulkin
card.property: {3}: Target green creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Jawbone Skulkin
card.property: {2}: Target red creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Leering Emblem
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {2}

card.name: Scarecrone
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a Scarecrow: Draw a card. {4}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Shell Skulkin
card.property: {3}: Target blue creature gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Ward of Bones
card.property: Each opponent who controls more creatures than you can't cast creature spells. The same is true for artifacts and enchantments. Each opponent who controls more lands than you can't play lands.

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {U/R}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R}.

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {W/B}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B}.

card.name: Flooded Grove
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {G/U}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{U}, or {U}{U}.

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W}.

card.name: Springjack Pasture
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token. {T}, Sacrifice X Goats: Add X mana of any one color. You gain X life.

card.name: Twilight Mire
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {B/G}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G}.
